name: The Dreadnought
description:
The Dreadnought is a short horror game following the HauntedPS1 Summer Jam's theme of submechanophobia, the fear of submerged man-made objects. In this game you pilot an unmanned submersible drone, tasked with finding a yacht that went missing shortly after its owner died.

For most of us who worked on this game, this was our first proper foray into game development. We're very proud of what we accomplished, and we hope you enjoy the game!
